mapper.insert: insert into get_log(method, class_name, payload, return_value, elapsed_time, create_time, create_by) values (#{entity.method}, #{entity.className}, #{entity.payload}, #{entity.returnValue}, #{entity.elapsedTime}, now(), #{entity.createBy})
mapper.update:
update get_log
return_value = #{entity.returnValue},
elapsed_time = #{entity.elapsedTime},
where log_id = #{entity.logId}
mapper.select: select l.`log_id`, l.`class_name`, l.`method`, l.`payload`, l.`return_value`, l.`elapsed_time`, l.`create_time`, l.`create_by` from get_log l where l.`log_id` = #{id}
